name: Froggy Adventure
description:
IMPORTANT! There is a known bug where the game freezes if there is a gamepad detected. I'm not entirely sure how to fix this, so if you run into this issue, please disconnect your gamepad, and the game will unfreeze.

Upon returning home for the day, Kerry realizes she left something behind- her pet frog! Hop your way through nine levels and get her back!

Use the Space bar to jump, and S to turn around. Yes, that's literally the entirety of your moveset. Good luck!
